---
category: news
title: "How speech to text, password managers and other tech helped me work with a broken collarbone"
excerpt: "I really wish I hadn't broken my collarbone. But one silver lining from the experience has been learning how well technology lets me live my life with one arm immobilized in a sling. Far and away, the best feature has been speech-to-text tools that let me type without a keyboard."
